## dropCursorPlugin() function

Create a drop cursor plugin which adds a decoration to the position that is currently being dragged over.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function dropCursorPlugin(params: ExtensionManagerParams, extension: Extension<DropCursorExtensionOptions>): Plugin<DropCursorState, any>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | <code>ExtensionManagerParams</code> |  |
|  extension | <code>Extension&lt;DropCursorExtensionOptions&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Plugin<DropCursorState, any>`
